Subjects: Thomas the apostle, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: ‘De Sancto thoma apostolo historia’ — in short lines

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Thomas þe apostill trewþat welk in werld here with ihesu…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And vnto his kingdom he us kenthurgh prayers of saint thomas Amen
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De Sancto thoma apostolo historia (rubric, f. 139va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 19-24.
